name: Channel
desc: See the fields returned by the read channel endpoint.

items.name: createdAt
items.desc: The date and time the channel was created.

items.name: fonts
items.desc: The list of custom fonts used in the channel. This list may be empty.

items.name: id
items.desc: The unique identifier of the channel.

items.name: modifiedAt
items.desc: The date and time the channel was last modified.

items.name: shareUrl
items.desc: The URL to the channel within the News app. The shareUrl field applies only on devices with iOS 9 installed.

items.name: website
items.desc: The website that corresponds to this channel.
